'''Fish''' is a [[Cooking Ingredient]] item used in recipes to create [[Food]] items.

==How to Obtain==
Wild [[:Category:Fish|Fish]] are found in various bodies of water around Teyvat. [[:Category:Bass|Basses]] are found in small groups in shallow waters. They can either be caught directly and transferred to the player's inventory immediately as a Fish item, or hit by attacks to drop a Fish item in their place which can be picked up by the player. In both cases, the product obtained is always one unit of the generic Fish ingredient, regardless of the subtype caught.

See the Video Guides section or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=122 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

Other species of Fish are exclusively found in [[Fishing/Fishing Points|Fishing Points]], and need to be [[Fishing|fished up]] properly to be caught. They do not directly award the Fish ingredient, but the fresh fish obtained can be [[Processing|processed]] to produce it, in different quantities depending on their size.

Additionally, the following NPCs give Fish after following a certain dialogue branch for the first time:
*[[Jiangxue]] at [[Wangshu Inn]], [[Liyue]] (5 Fish)
*[[Obata]] in [[Ritou]], [[Inazuma]] (10 Fish)
*[[Uncle Tian]] in [[Liyue Harbor]], [[Liyue]] (5 Fish)
*[[Will]] at [[Falcon Coast]], [[Mondstadt]] (4 Fish)
